( The content has been removed but of the article  "Web Hosting-FAQ's "Let’s start with Web Space. Web Space is found on a web server and is where you store your files on the Internet. A web server is a high-powered computer that provides essential services across a network. In order for your website to have access to Web Space on the Internet you must rent some from a web host. Web hosts provide web servers for you to rent web space.....". the article is infringed by the search results below beginning with  "Let’s start with Web Space. Web Space is found on a web server..)
